values: To maximize something is to make it as great as possible in amount, size, or importance.
You should exercise regularly to maximize a healthy lifestyle.
vt. 使(某事物)增至最大限度最大限度地利用(某事物)
时态:maximized, maximizing, maximizes名 词:maximization
名 词:maximizer
